What to Prepare: A clear, memorable name for your product.
A short paragraph explaining what your product does and who it's for.
Your name or team name as it should appear on VibeRush.
A catchy one-liner that describes your product (max ~60 chars).
Link to your live product or landing page (https://...).
AI, SaaS, Developer Tools, Design, Productivity, etc.
Lovable, Cursor, v0, Supabase, Bolt, Replit, etc.
A 1584×396px visual banner (PNG/JPG, under 1MB). See Hero Banner Guide.
A 256×256px icon/logo (PNG with transparency recommended, under 500KB).
Up to 4 screenshots of your product UI (1280×720 recommended).
The initial prompt that sparked your creation.
How long it took to build your product (e.g. '2 days', '1 week').
